hotels.name: San Francisco Marriott Marquis
hotels.description: Whether you are in town for business or leisure, San Francisco welcomes travelers to Northern California with exceptional service.

hotels.name: Grand Central Hotel New York
hotels.description: Luxury hotel in the heart of Manhattan with stunning city views and world-class amenities.

hotels.name: Ocean View Resort Miami
hotels.description: Beachfront resort with direct ocean access and tropical paradise vibes.

hotels.name: Downtown Chicago Suites
hotels.description: Spacious suites perfect for extended stays in downtown Chicago.

hotels.name: Vegas Strip Palace
hotels.description: Experience the excitement of Vegas with luxurious accommodations right on the Strip.

hotels.name: Seattle Waterfront Hotel
hotels.description: Stunning waterfront views with easy access to Pike Place Market and Seattle attractions.

hotels.name: Boston Historic Inn
hotels.description: Charming historic inn in the heart of Boston with classic New England hospitality.

hotels.name: Austin Music District Hotel
hotels.description: Experience Austin's vibrant music scene with live performances and downtown energy.

hotels.name: Denver Mountain Lodge
hotels.description: Mountain lodge atmosphere with easy access to Denver's attractions and nearby ski resorts.

hotels.name: Nashville Country Inn
hotels.description: Authentic Nashville experience with country music and Southern hospitality.

hotels.name: Portland Eco Hotel
hotels.description: Sustainable hotel with eco-friendly practices and access to Portland's unique culture.

hotels.name: New Orleans Jazz Hotel
hotels.description: Immerse yourself in New Orleans culture with jazz music and authentic Creole atmosphere.

hotels.name: Phoenix Desert Resort
hotels.description: Desert oasis with world-class spa treatments and championship golf course.

hotels.name: Atlanta Peachtree Hotel
hotels.description: Modern business hotel in downtown Atlanta with excellent conference facilities.

hotels.name: San Diego Beach Hotel
hotels.description: Beachfront paradise with direct beach access and perfect California weather.

hotels.name: Minneapolis Skyway Hotel
hotels.description: Connected to Minneapolis skyway system, perfect for winter weather protection.

hotels.name: Four Seasons Hotel Cairo at The First Residence
hotels.description: A luxurious 5-star hotel with an upscale shopping mall, multiple restaurants, a spa, and stunning views of the Nile and the Great Pyramids.

hotels.name: Marriott Mena House, Cairo
hotels.description: A polished 5-star hotel boasting unparalleled pyramid views, a golf course, and a spa. Popular for its historical charm and proximity to the Giza Pyramids.

hotels.name: Hilton Luxor Resort & Spa
hotels.description: A 5-star eco-certified spa retreat with chic restaurants, a shisha lounge, and infinity pools overlooking the Nile. Ideal for relaxation.

hotels.name: Steigenberger Nile Palace
hotels.description: An unpretentious yet formal 5-star eco-certified hotel offering a range of dining options and an outdoor pool, situated by the Nile.

hotels.name: JAZ Aquaviva
hotels.description: An upscale, all-inclusive 5-star eco-certified resort known for its water park, elegant restaurants, and swanky bars, perfect for families and leisure.

hotels.name: Rixos Premium Magawish Suites & Villas
hotels.description: A highly-rated 5-star resort in Hurghada offering exceptional luxury and service, with a focus on suites and villas.

hotels.name: Best View Pyramids Hotel
hotels.description: A laid-back 3-star hotel with rooms offering direct views of the Pyramids of Khufu, plus a rooftop bar and restaurant. Excellent value for its location.

hotels.name: The Nile Ritz-Carlton, Cairo
hotels.description: A sophisticated 5-star hotel located in Downtown Cairo, offering luxury and a convenient location near major attractions.

hotels.name: Kempinski Nile Hotel Cairo
hotels.description: A 5-star hotel in Downtown Cairo known for its elegance and service, often featuring a rooftop pool and views of the Nile.

hotels.name: Le Méridien Cairo Airport
hotels.description: A convenient and highly-rated 5-star hotel located directly at Cairo Airport, perfect for layovers or early/late flights.

hotels.name: Sofitel Winter Palace Luxor
hotels.description: An iconic 5-star hotel in Luxor with a rich history, beautiful gardens, and stunning views of the Nile, offering a blend of classic elegance and modern comfort.

hotels.name: Royal Mansour Marrakech
hotels.description: Considered one of the world's most luxurious hotels, this hotel offers private riads instead of traditional rooms, set within a recreated medina with stunning gardens.

hotels.name: La Mamounia
hotels.description: An iconic and legendary palace hotel in Marrakech, known for its opulent Moroccan design, vast gardens, and world-class spa.

hotels.name: The Oberoi Marrakech
hotels.description: A serene and luxurious retreat offering spacious villas and pavilions set amidst olive groves, with stunning views of the Atlas Mountains.

hotels.name: Kasbah Tamadot
hotels.description: Sir Richard Branson's luxurious boutique hotel in the Atlas Mountains, combining relaxation with adventure in a stylish and authentic setting. Known for its iconic infinity pool.

hotels.name: Four Seasons Resort Marrakech
hotels.description: Nestled in beautiful Moorish gardens, this elegant hotel offers a luxurious retreat with contemporary design and is a short walk from the bustling Medina.

hotels.name: Riad Kniza
hotels.description: A highly-rated, intimate luxury riad located in the heart of Marrakech's Old Medina, known for its exceptional hospitality and traditional charm.

hotels.name: Savoy Le Grand Hotel Marrakech
hotels.description: A popular 5-star luxury hotel in Marrakech, offering a grand experience with good reviews for its service and facilities.

hotels.name: Palais Amani
hotels.description: A one-of-a-kind luxury retreat in the medieval capital of Fes, brimming with historic culture and offering a serene escape.

hotels.name: Hotel Riu Palace Tikida Taghazout - All Inclusive
hotels.description: A 5-star all-inclusive luxury hotel in Taghazout, popular for those seeking a beach resort experience with comprehensive amenities.

hotels.name: Agafay Luxury Camp
hotels.description: For a unique luxury desert experience, this camp offers secluded retreats in Berber tents under the starry sky, with options for activities like buggy rides.

hotels.name: Grace Hotel Santorini, Auberge Resorts Collection
hotels.description: An exclusive luxury boutique hotel in a spectacular location high on Santorini's Caldera, renowned for its design and breathtaking Aegean sunsets.

hotels.name: Canaves Oia Epitome
hotels.description: Located in Oia, this luxurious property offers private villas with stunning sea views and exceptional design, known for its privacy and elegance.

hotels.name: Myconian Utopia Resort
hotels.description: Combines unspoiled nature with contemporary design, offering exclusive, tailor-made hospitality on Mykonos, with breathtaking views.

hotels.name: Cavo Tagoo Mykonos
hotels.description: A famous luxury hotel known for its iconic infinity pool with a swim-up bar and minimalist, chic design, offering panoramic sea views.

hotels.name: Domes of Elounda, Autograph Collection
hotels.description: Consisting solely of unique design suites and villas, this resort offers a true Mediterranean luxury experience on Crete, blending with the natural environment.

hotels.name: The Romanos, a Luxury Collection Resort
hotels.description: Part of a larger luxury resort complex, The Romanos offers private infinity pools, butler service, and upgraded amenities amidst rugged hills and a long coastline.

hotels.name: Angsana Corfu Resort & Spa
hotels.description: The first Banyan Tree property in Europe, blending Greek hospitality with Asian influences, featuring elegant rooms, suites, and villas with private pools and sea views.

hotels.name: The Dolli
hotels.description: A new luxury hotel in the vibrant Plaka neighborhood of Athens, just steps from the Acropolis. Features individually appointed rooms and a breathtaking infinity pool with Acropolis views.

hotels.name: Grecotel Cape Sounio
hotels.description: An iconic resort recently renovated, set against the legendary Temple of Poseidon with pine forests and two private beaches. Offers an innovative wellness program.

hotels.name: Stella Island Luxury Resort & Spa - Adults Only
hotels.description: A highly-rated adults-only luxury resort on Crete, known for its stunning lagoon-style pools and a focus on relaxation and romantic getaways.

recommended_hotels.name: San Francisco Marriott Marquis
recommended_hotels.description: Whether you are in town for business or leisure, San Francisco welcomes travelers to Northern California with exceptional service.

recommended_hotels.description: Beachfront resort with direct ocean access and tropical paradise vibes.

recommended_hotels.name: Downtown Chicago Suites
recommended_hotels.description: Spacious suites perfect for extended stays in downtown Chicago.

recommended_hotels.name: Vegas Strip Palace
recommended_hotels.description: Experience the excitement of Vegas with luxurious accommodations right on the Strip.

recommended_hotels.description: Beachfront paradise with direct beach access and perfect California weather.
